messages.def_login: Log into PIM to edit these values
messages.frontDesk_blindDrop: Use 'Blind Drop' option for cash deposits?
messages.groupReservation_allowExcelFileExportFor: Allow Excel File Export for Group Folio?
messages.groupReservation_checkWithRevenueOrYield: Keep the ability to associate group members with the group masters regardless of booked SRP by selecting 'No.' Check with the Revenue/Yield Manager before amending this setting
messages.groupReservation_groupMbrsMustSrp: Group Mbrs must have SRP specified on Group Master?
messages.groupReservation_groupMktCategory: Market Category can be changed on group Master
messages.groupReservation_receiptsOrInvoices: In Countries where official receipts are printed at checkout, select 'No' since legal receipts/invoices are not automatically created for batch printed folios
messages.localInfo_traceFollowupTime: Select default follow-up time for Trace
messages.planGroupModal_deleteSelectedRow: Are you sure to delete the selected row? This action can't be undone.
messages.receiptMessaging_directBillCheckoutRecei: Direct Bill Checkout Receipt Message Text
messages.receiptMessaging_optionalReceiptMessages: Enter optional receipt messages below to print on Guest Folio
messages.receiptMessaging_preRegistrationInformat: Pre-Registration Information Text (not compatible with Eforms Smart Boxes)
messages.receiptMessaging_saveYourChanges: Would you like to save your changes before leaving this section? If you don't, your changes will be lost.
messages.receiptSetup_allowBatchPrinting: Allow Batch Printing for the following
messages.receiptSetup_alwaysPrintPreReg: Reprint Registration Card if Previously Printed
messages.receiptSetup_autoRegCardPrint: Print Registration Card at Guest check-in
messages.receiptSetup_cmpyAddrTax: Company Name, Address and TAX ID Number
messages.receiptSetup_configureSettings: Remember to configure the settings if you have printed the hotel name and address on them
messages.receiptSetup_deliverOfficiaRleceipts: How would you like to deliver Official Receipts
messages.receiptSetup_doNotReprintPostingsOnOffic: Do Not Reprint Postings on Receipts
messages.receiptSetup_eformsFile: Check your email for a file containing the Eforms file
messages.receiptSetup_eformsOrderToLicenses: Contact Eforms to order the Licenses
messages.receiptSetup_guestReceipts: How would you like to deliver Guest Receipts
messages.receiptSetup_hstPurgeMonths: Months Before Purging Guest Stay History
messages.receiptSetup_mailPrintDelivery: Check your mail to receive the print delivery
messages.receiptSetup_printUniqueInvoiceNumOnOffi: Each Official Receipt Must Have a Unique Number
messages.receiptSetup_printpropAddrOnReceipt: Include Hotel Address, Phone, and Fax Numbers
messages.receiptSetup_settlementReversalPrintsAll: Settlement Reversal Print All Associated Charges
messages.receiptSetup_standardSettings: Standard Settings for the time to wait before the system will archive folios, A/R records, etc.
messages.receiptSetup_useLegalPrinterAssignmentFo: Use Legal Receipt Printer for Official Receipts
messages.receiptSetup_useWorkstationPrinter: Use Workstation Printer Assignments for Official Receipts?
messages.receiptSetup_x11KeyPacket: Use the 8.5x11 Key Packet Format when Printing
messages.receiptSetup_x14KeyPacket: Use the 8.5x14 Key Packet Format when Printing
messages.requestCode_areYouSureWantToLeaveWithout: Are you sure you want to leave the page without saving your changes?
messages.requestCode_deleteTheSelectedRow: Are you sure you want to delete the selected row? This action can't be undone. (single row selected)
messages.requestCode_deleteTheSelectedRows: Are you sure you want to delete the selected rows? This action can't be undone. (multi row selected)
messages.requestCode_indicateWhichSpecialReqCode: Indicate which special request codes are used and the appropriate attributes.
